snippet: Many landmarks of the Jersey Shore burned to ashes Thursday, including Kohr’s Frozen Custard, which had already endured the tremendous destruction wrought by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Among landmarks of Jersey Shore that burned to ashes in massive blaze extending from Seaside Heights to Seaside Park were four Kohr’s Frozen Custard stands; perhaps none of businesses affected by fire can claim longevity and fame of Kohr's, which opened its first Seaside Heights store in early 1920s and whose iconic blue logo graces as many as a dozen frozen custard stands up and down the shore.

byline.original: By VIVIAN YEE and ELI ROSENBERG

lead_paragraph: Many landmarks of the Jersey Shore burned to ashes Thursday, including Kohr’s Frozen Custard, which had already endured the tremendous destruction wrought by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.main: A Much-Loved Family Business Meets Disaster Again on the Shore
headline.print_headline: A Much-Loved Family Business Meets Disaster Again on the Shore
